events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived, and the tracking number shows no updates. Can you help?
The customer's complaint was identified as a delivery delay issue based on their message mentioning late shipment and tracking problems.
An agent from the logistics support team has been assigned to handle the customer's delivery delay case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm sorry for the delay you're experiencing.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking code so I can check the status with our carrier?
Sure, my order number is 457892 and the tracking code is TRK123456789. I haven't seen any updates for a week.
I've contacted the shipping carrier on your behalf; they confirmed a delay due to weather but expect delivery within three days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate you looking into it and hope the package arrives soon.
We will keep monitoring the delivery, and you should receive your package shortly as per the latest information from the carrier.
Checking in to confirm that your package has arrived and that everything is satisfactory with your order.
Yes, I received the package yesterday and everything is in good condition now. Thanks for the help!
Glad everything arrived safely. We have now closed your case. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
